channel.title: Windows 10 Whonix .ova files without installer downloads?
channel.description:
Hello, I want to install whonix in Windows by myself.
Is still possible to get the whonix virtualbox vitual machines whitout the installer? I mean gateway and workstation files alone.
If yes, where can I download them?
Thank you, greetings.

item.title: Windows 10 Whonix .ova files without installer downloads?
item.dc:creator: germi
item.description:
Oh! I was unable to find them.

I hope this can be useful for others.

Thank you so much.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 10 Whonix .ova files without installer downloads?
